$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab.text:
\import $:/plugins-macros

<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}
  newtabCaption={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption}}
  newtabText={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Text}}
  storeTiddler="$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title/input"
  listopsTiddler="$:/plugins-my-works/newtab"
  >
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<newtabTitle>> text="">
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<storeTiddler>> text=<<newtabTitle>>/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<newtabTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newtabTitle>> caption=<<newtabCaption>> tags=<<systemCTag>> text=<<newtabText>> list-before=<<listopsTiddler>>/>
</$reveal>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$
\define get-text() $(textField)$
<$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-plugincard/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-plugincard/Text}}>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<<now "plugin-YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">> caption="a plugincard" tags=<<get-tags>> text=<<get-text>> url="" linkstyle=""/>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate.title: $:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate
$:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate.text:
\whitespace trim <$link to={{!!title}} class="tc-plugin-info">
<$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/icon]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [get[plugin-type]addprefix[$:/core/images/plugin-generic-]] }}}/>

''<$text text={{{ [get[name]] ~[split[/]last[1]] }}}/>''

<$view field="title"/>

<$view field="version"/>

$:/xp/ui/AdvancedSearch/Plugins.title: $:/xp/ui/AdvancedSearch/Plugins
$:/xp/ui/AdvancedSearch/Plugins.caption: Plugins
$:/xp/ui/AdvancedSearch/Plugins.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define statusTid() $:/config/Aggregation/plugins-currently-installed/status \define storeTitle() $:/temp/advancedsearch \define set-next-input-tab(beforeafter:"after") <$macrocall $name="change-input-tab" stateTitle="$:/state/tab--20210602130115732" tag="$:/tags/SideBar/AdvancedSearch" beforeafter="$beforeafter$" defaultState="$:/xp/ui/AdvancedSearch/System" actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/advancedsearchinsidebar/currentTab" text=<>/>"""/> \define cancel-search-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}!match{$:/temp/advancedsearch/input}]" emptyMessage="""<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]] [[$:/temp/advancedsearch/input]] [[$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item]]" />"""><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" text="yes"/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".tc-advanced-search input"""/> \define input-accept-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \define input-accept-variant-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \define toggleButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="table" type="match" text="table"> <$button tooltip="Switching to list view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="list"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list"> <$button tooltip="Switching to card view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="table"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} \end

Search for installed plugins

<$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<>> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" storeTitle=<> refreshTitle="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" selectionStateTitle="$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item" type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} statusTidFilter="[[$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/System]]" inputCancelActions=<> inputAcceptActions=<> inputAcceptVariantActions=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$vars pluginFilter="[plugin-type[plugin]] [plugin-type[theme]] [plugin-type[language]] +[!has[draft.of]sort[]search:-text,*]" userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>" qualified-state=<>>
<> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list" animate="yes"> <$list filter=<>>
addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> <$link><$view field="title"/> <$view field="version"/>
<$reveal state=<> default="table" type="match" text="table" animate="yes"> <$list filter=<> emptyMessage=<> template="$:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate"/>

$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab.title: $:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new myworks tab
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab.text:
<$button
  actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab}}
  tooltip="Create a new tab"
  aria-label="new myworks tab">
Create
</$button>

PLUGINS.title: PLUGINS
PLUGINS.caption: {{$:/xp/images/plugin}} PLUGINS
PLUGINS.text:
\import $:/plugins-macros
<$button actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard}} tooltip="Create a plugincard" aria-label="new plugincard" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new plugincard  (<$count filter='[tag!has[draft.of]]'/> tiddlers) <$button to="$:/plugins-help" tooltip="PLUGINS Help" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/help}}
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="$:/plugins-my-collections $:/plugins-my-works $:/plugins-currently-installed" default="$:/plugins-my-collections" state="$:/state/tab/plugins" />

$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView.title: $:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView
$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView.caption: 列表视图
$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView.text:
<$vars pluginFilter="[plugin-type[plugin]] [plugin-type[theme]] [plugin-type[language]] +[!has[draft.of]sort[]search:-text,*]">
    <$list filter=<>>
  1. <$link><$view field='title'/>　<$view field='version'/>

$:/plugins-currently-installed.title: $:/plugins-currently-installed
$:/plugins-currently-installed.caption: 已装插件
$:/plugins-currently-installed.text:
\define statusTid() $:/config/Aggregation/plugins-currently-installed/status \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/plugins-currently-installed \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-installed-plugins input"""/> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value="table" default="table"> 默认视图   <$radio field="text" value="list"> 列表视图  
Search all fields except text <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="table" default="table" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/DefaultView}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView}}

$:/plugins-help.title: $:/plugins-help
$:/plugins-help.text:
''PLUGINS 的用途：''收集和管理自己的 TiddlyWiki 插件。 ! 如何使用？ !!! 点击 {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new plugincard 创建一个插件的信息卡片 字段说明： |!Field |!Description | |`caption` |显示名称，通常是对 `title` 的简化。 | |`url` |插件的获取地址。 | |^`linkstyle` |//(optional)// 用于修改该条目的链接样式。比如修改颜色可以填入 `color:red;` 或者 `color:<>;`。
该功能由 $:/LinkStyle/Stylesheet 提供。 | 其他帮助说明： * [[Aggregation Help|$:/aggregation/help]] / [[Bookshelf Help|$:/bookshelf-help]]

$:/plugins-my-collections/cardview.title: $:/plugins-my-collections/cardview
$:/plugins-my-collections/cardview.caption: Card View
$:/plugins-my-collections/cardview.text:
\import $:/aggregation/macros \import $:/plugins-macros \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/plugins-my-collections \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-my-collections input"""/> <$list filter="[tag!has[draft.of]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="{{$:/plugins-prompt}}" variable="ignore"> Search <> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Aggregation/Search/AutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} aggrFilter={{{ [get[text]] }}} resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>"> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes"> <>

<$list filter=<> template="$:/templates/transclusion-infocard" />

$:/plugins-my-collections/must-have.title: $:/plugins-my-collections/must-have
$:/plugins-my-collections/must-have.caption: Must Have
$:/plugins-my-collections/must-have.text: 罗列必装插件的链接。可用于检查是否已经安装。 @@.twocolumns !! Online Plugin Library !! Plugins !! Themes and Palettes !! Languages @@

$:/plugins-my-collections/notes.title: $:/plugins-my-collections/notes
$:/plugins-my-collections/notes.text: 此处罗列插件相关信息。

$:/plugins-my-collections.title: $:/plugins-my-collections
$:/plugins-my-collections.caption: 我的收集
$:/plugins-my-collections.text:
\define statusTid() $:/config/Aggregation/plugins-my-collections/status

<$tiddler tiddler=<<statusTid>>>
<$radio field="text" value="info" default="info"> 插件信息 </$radio> 
<$radio field="text" value="recent"> 最近添加 </$radio>
</$tiddler>

<!-- 插件信息 -->
<$reveal state=<<statusTid>> type="match" text="info" default="info" animate="yes">
{{$:/plugins-my-collections/notes}}
{{$:/plugins-my-collections/plugin-info}}
</$reveal>

<!-- 最近添加 -->
<$reveal state=<<statusTid>> type="match" text="recent" animate="yes">
{{$:/plugins-my-collections/recently-added}}
</$reveal>

$:/plugins-my-works/maintenance-list.title: $:/plugins-my-works/maintenance-list
$:/plugins-my-works/maintenance-list.caption: Maintenance List
$:/plugins-my-works/maintenance-list.text:
\define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/plugins-maintenance-list \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-maintained-plugins input"""/> \define maintainedPlugins() 在这里列出你的插件列表 \end
Search all fields except text <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus="false" inputCancelActions=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} aggrFilter="[enlistsort[]search:-text,*]">
    <$list filter=<> template="$:/templates/list-plugins"/>

$:/plugins-my-works/managetabs.title: $:/plugins-my-works/managetabs
$:/plugins-my-works/managetabs.caption: {{$:/core/images/options-button}}
$:/plugins-my-works/managetabs.text:
\import $:/plugins-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/plugins-my-works/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!tag[hide]!has[draft.of]remove[$:/plugins-my-works/newtab $:/plugins-my-works/managetabs]]'> \end ! 默认页面 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 隐藏页面 Drag and drop to change the ordering
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter="!tag[hide]!has[draft.of]remove[$:/plugins-my-works/newtab $:/plugins-my-works/managetabs]" itemTemplate="$:/templates/checkbox-tagmode" /> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tagtag[hide]!has[draft.of]]">
<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="hide"/> ~~ <$transclude field="caption"/> -- <$transclude field="description"/>~~

$:/plugins-my-works/newtab.title: $:/plugins-my-works/newtab
$:/plugins-my-works/newtab.caption: {{$:/core/images/new-button}}
$:/plugins-my-works/newtab.text:
\define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title
\define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption
\define textStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Text
\define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title/input
\define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab}}

\define deleteButton()
\whitespace trim
<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newtabTitle>]" variable="ignore">
<$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right">
{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?">
<$action-deletetiddler $filter=<<newtabTitle>>/>
<$action-deletetiddler $filter=<<storeTiddler>>/>
</$action-confirm>
</$button>
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

\define promptText()
<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newtabTitle>]" variable="ignore">
{{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}}
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

! 新建页签

|<$link to=<<titleStoreTiddler>>>Title</$link> |<$edit-text tiddler=<<titleStoreTiddler>> default="" tag="input"/> <<deleteButton>> |
|<$link to=<<captionStoreTiddler>>>Caption</$link> |<$edit-text tiddler=<<captionStoreTiddler>> default="" tag="input"/> |
|<$link to=<<textStoreTiddler>>>Text</$link> |<$edit tiddler=<<textStoreTiddler>> tag="textarea" class="tc-edit-texteditor" default=""/> |
|>| <<newButton>> |

<<promptText>>

$:/plugins-prompt.title: $:/plugins-prompt
$:/plugins-prompt.text:
{{$:/core/images/plugin-generic-plugin}}
New plugincard will appear here
